start.text: Win the battle, win the war.
Set reactor output to combat levels.
Let's play this by the numbers.
Let us get down to business.

retreat.text: They told me this ship is fast!
Discretion is the better part of valor.
Roger that, let's get out of here.
Today is not my day to be one with the void.
Count me out, I don't get paid enough for this!
Full burn away from here, I want those engines melting!
I'm out of here, Godspeed to the rest of you.
Let's get the hell out of here!

out_of_missiles.text: What do you mean my missiles are depleted?
Missile racks are out of ordnance.
Our missiles are depleted, none remain on-board.
Fire everything! Ah shit, we fired all our missiles already?
We have used all of our expendable ordnance.
I really could use some boomers right about now...
Well, just fired the last of my missiles.

engaged.text: This is a target rich environment.
This party has only just started!
It is time to conclude this battle.

need_help.text: Cycle long free drinks to whoever saves my hide!
Stumbled into a kill box over here, please assist!
Up shit creek without a paddle, please help me!
Not going to last much longer, can I get some backup?
I need help over here like yesterday!
This is going to hell in a handbasket!
I don't think I am going to make it without reinforcements.
Mission outcome is looking... Not good.
I need a squad over here ASAP!

pursuing.text: Fire, FIRE! Don't let them through!
Leave no survivors, I want that ship a smoldering wreck!
Kill them! Kill them until they are dead!

running.text: We need to back off a little bit.
Helm, break off so we can dissipate flux safely.
Too hot for comfort over here!
God dammit, we are in over our heads!
Pulling back, we should reform our battle lines.

hull_90.text: Son of a bitch, just painted this thing last week.
Ah! There goes my drink, what a waste.
Prepare a damage control team, the battle has only just begun.
Taking hits, but are OK for now.
My ship is taking damage, but I will return the favor tenfold!
Armor plating has been breached, but internal compartments are still holding.
My ship is taking damage but so far it remains non-critical.

hull_50.text: That last hit just took out the canteen, looks like it's take out.
That was a nuke! Or worse...
Is that one of my crew I can see outside the aft window?

hull_30.text: This rustbucket is coming apart at the seams!
I'm not ready to die yet!
Port side magazine is cooking off!
Come on baby, don't break apart on me yet!
Half the bridge crew just got spaced!
All hands, prepare to abandon ship!
The reactor's coolant pressure is dropping!
Bulkheads are buckling, I am not going to last much longer!
This is it folks, now or never!
I shall find honor in death, just hopefully not today!

overload.text: Who set off sparklers on my bridge!?
My ship's flux just tipped into the red!
The flux capacitors are bleeding out!
They are going to blow out the reactor at this rate!

death.text: I die so you may live.
My ship has a reactor brea-
The ship is volatile, get away from us!
Tell my wife and kids I love them.
I didn't think I would die like this...

victory.text: Heh, look at them scatter like roaches.
Glorious victory, let us drink to commemorate!
Like shooting Volturnian lobster in a barrel.
We taught them the meaning of ship superiority.
Just be glad that it is over with.
Seems like it wasn't my time yet.
That was damn fine shooting boys.
Haha, tell your friends, this show has only just started!
The battle is won, let us not forget the dead.

victory_boss.text: I told you size doesn't matter.
High value target has been elimated.
Remind me to set some boundaries.
Get my medal case! Someone's getting a new one.
I can feel the sweat on my brow.
